wikipedia_page.main: Graham Moughton (born 2 December 1948) is a retired English boxer. He competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in the light-welterweight division, but was eliminated in the third bout.

response: :* First round — Lost to Graham Moughton (GBR), 0:5
